<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListNBox

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns size of 2D listbox or combobox as [rows, columns].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[lnbSize]] controlOrIDC

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> controlOrIDC: [[Control]] or [[Number]] - Control or control's IDC

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - in format [rows, columns]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lnbSize]] _control;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[lnbSize]] _someIDC;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lnbAddArray]], [[lnbAddColumn]], [[lnbAddRow]], [[lnbClear]], [[lnbColor]], [[lnbCurSelRow]], [[lnbData]], [[lnbDeleteColumn]], [[lnbDeleteRow]], [[lnbGetColumnsPosition]], [[lnbPicture]], [[lnbSetColor]], [[lnbSetColumnsPos]], [[lnbSetCurSelRow]], [[lnbSetData]], [[lnbSetPicture]], [[lnbSetText]], [[lnbSetValue]], [[lnbText]], [[lnbValue]]
</value></part></template>
